snippet: The ruling clashes with one that a federal judge in Washington issued last month, concluding that the labor board did have the authority to issue its order on posting notices.
lead_paragraph: The ruling clashes with one that a federal judge in Washington issued last month, concluding that the labor board did have the authority to issue its order on posting notices.

headline.main: Employers Don’t Have to Post Union Notices, Judge Rules
headline.print_headline: Employers Don’t Have to Post Union Notices, Judge Rules
